titleStmt.title: The glorie of man consisting in the excellencie and perfection of woman Gathered out of Holie Scriptures, and most renowned wryters; as well ancient, as moderne; ecclesiaticall, as morall. Wherevnto is annexed The duetie of husbands.
titleStmt.author: Raban, Edward, d. 1658.

notesStmt.note: "The duetie of husbands: drawne out of Master Carter his boke of Christian commonwealth" has separate half title; pagination and register are continuous.
The first leaf has a woodcut of a rooster.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
